TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MetaKeyKeyListener extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: This base class encapsulates the behavior for tracking the state of meta keys such as SHIFT, ALT and SYM as well as the pseudo-meta state of selecting text.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: static member AdjustMetaAfterKeypress : Android.Text.ISpannable -> unit
public static void AdjustMetaAfterKeypress (Android.Text.ISpannable? content);
.method public static hidebysig void AdjustMetaAfterKeypress(class Android.Text.ISpannable content) cil managed

Docs.summary: Call this method after you handle a keypress so that the meta state will be reset to unshifted (if it is not still down) or primed to be reset to unshifted (once it is released).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
